intro: Solanum muansense subsp. mildbraedii, commonly known as the Muansense nightshade, is a member of the Solanaceae family. It is a herbaceous plant native to tropical regions of Southeast Asia. The plant typically features elliptical leaves with a smooth or slightly pubescent surface. Its flowers are usually white or pale blue, with five petals and stamens that are often hairy. The fruit is a globose berry that turns red when mature, containing numerous small seeds.
